price: Lẹ́yìn náà, A ji yín dìde lẹ́yìn ikú yín, nítorí kí ẹ lè dúpẹ́ (fún Allāhu).¹
arabic: ثُمَّ بَعَثۡنَٰكُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ مَوۡتِكُمۡ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: thumma baʿathnākum min baʿdi mawtikum laʿallakum tashkurūna
